abstract: The Justice Department on Thursday effectively gave Verizon Wireless the go-ahead to buy Alltel in a $28 billion deal that would create the nation’s largest wireless carrier.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department on Thursday effectively gave Verizon Wireless the go-ahead to buy Alltel in a $28 billion deal that would create the nation’s largest wireless carrier.

headline.main: Verizon Told to Sell Assets With Alltel Merger
